text-node.description: Contains the login procedure specific for the wishlist.
Expects: Product or ProductID or pid
Adds a product given by the http parameter "pid" to the wishlist and displays the updated wishlist.
Set the shipping address for the wish list. Expects: AddressID
This pipeline is used for adding items from the quick order to my favorites.
Returns JSON with product IDs in the customer's wishlist
Remove Wishlist product on second click of Favorite Icon on PDP.
